description.en:
Do I want to live? Of course I do!

Just before she gets hit by a huge truck, Inseo Han, an ordinary South Korean woman who worked in a research lab, receives a text message offering her a special journey, new relationships, and opportunities for extra income. Determined to make it out of the situation alive, she accepts the offer and soon finds herself in the Raotwan Empire of Laseania as Duke Adrian's 12th fiancee candidate, Isella Derhen. Inseo has to act the role for an entire month in order to make it back to earth alive, but this job requires her to deceive not only a few nobles but the entire empire as well as the emperor. Not only that, but Duke Adrian demands that Inseo must never fall in love with him.

Meanwhile, Adrian, the duke and patriach of House Beleskez, is in search of an adequate fiancee to avoid a royal marriage with the emperor's third daughter, Princess Kiersten. Though things would be very simple if the princess were to marry the duke's son, Lord Aslan, political strife complicates the situation and Adrian cannot simply turn down the marriage. Hence, he seeks someone who can act as his fiancee so he would have a justified reason to avoid the royal marriage until Aslan succeeds the dukedom.

Will Inseo win the deal and the opportunity to save her life? Can she and Adrian pull off the tremendous act without getting caught?

---

description.ko:
한국의 평범한 대학원생 한인서.

트럭에 치이기 직전 마법사의 요청을 받아 차원을 넘어 라세아니아로 넘어가게 되는데,

그곳에서 벨레스케즈 공작의 약혼녀를 연기해줄 것을 요구받는다.

영 까칠한 벨레스케즈 공작을 설득하여 역할을 따내는 데 성공,

차근차근 완벽한 약혼녀를 연기해나간다.

까칠했던 남자가 다정해지는 순간,

한인서의 가슴도 두근거리기 시작한다.


“우리에게 주어진 시간은 고작 30일뿐이지요.

남은 시간, 저는 전력을 다해 당신을 유혹할 겁니다.

---
